dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: You called me? Ow, my tongue's burning... Right, how can I help?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: As often as we get physical... we still have paperwork to take care of in the morning. There are meetings, too.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Alright~ Let's go eat something first. You aren't gonna follow along if it's beef noodles again? I mean, what other place around here serves meals that good?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Haah... Maybe I should wear sunglasses for night training. All the flickering flames are hard on my eyes.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: This venue? Sure, I go often. I'm a regular.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: This clothing's embroidery was made with moonlight stones. I heard higher sections get more of these fancyworks.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
We look like we get along fine? Well... I see how you get that impression. We gather up and rub shoulders with each other pretty much all the time, after all.
Hmph, and yet they won't join me to dine nearly as often.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Liu Association offers opportunities to learn all kinds of martial arts and techniques, Bajiquan was my personal favorite.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Ah... You wanna know how we deal with sharp weapons? Heh, this jacket isn't easily penetrated by the likes of them. The fabric used by my coworkers in higher sections can stop even more, I think?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: ...I see. I'll get busier, won't I. Well, I'll be training myself to prepare for it.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Hmm... Should I look up... what to eat next?

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I'm with you.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I'll take the front.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Keep your distance. You'll get yourself hurt.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I'll end this in a moment.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: That's one...

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Kgh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Down the gutter!

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Agh... I could... really use... a bowl of beef... noodles.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: This is no trouble at all.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Tch... I've failed.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: This... wasn't too bad, don't you think?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Whew~ That was a job well done. Wanna have some beef noodles on the way back?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: I'll need... more experience and training, it seems...
